#summary Get a request token for attempting to authorize access to a user's feed

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_partner


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
||*Required*||*Name*||*Type*||*Description*||
||*required*||callbackUrl||string||URL to send the user to after they log in.||
</table>

==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
||*Code*||*Exception*||*Description*||
||400||TBException_InvalidInput||Partner Key does not exist.||
</table>


==Return Syntax==
{{{
<tokResult>
     <requestToken partnerKey="###">
          <token>b8a50ef6139677be5979ebbc4a46a4aa</token>
     </requestToken>
     <serverInformation>
          <address>76.74.154.35</address>
          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/auth/getRequestToken</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>
     <partner key="###"/>
     <timer startTime="1217972508.3002" execTime="17.180919647217"/>
</tokResult>
}}}

==Notes==
  * The developer must sign this request with their {PARTNER_SECRET}
